welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Pedro Sula, the vibrant heart of Honduras! Get ready to discover our city's rich culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your time exploring all that San Pedro Sula has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pizzería Italia
restaurants.description: Pizzería Italia is a pizzeria located in San Pedro Sula.
restaurants.address: 7 Ave N.O. (1 Calle), San Pedro Sula, Cortés
